name: teeny tiny cupcake
description: A tiny collectable cupcake for the one you love - or who loves cupcakes! ♥ Choose from blackforest, butterscotch and chocolate flavours. The cupcake is presented on a randomly selected handmade plate, it is not fixed to the plate. * * * * * * * * * * * * * * Both cupcake and plate are modelled in polymer clay. Each cupcake is about an 3/4 of an inch in high and 1/2 an inch wide. (20mm x 15mm approx.) The plate is just under 1 inch in diameter (24mm approx.) * * * * * * * * * * * * * * My "replicakes" models are not made to any strict scale. They are intended as collectables, not toys. If you would like a different colour or personalised design, I am more than happy to take custom orders.

name: teatime plateful
description: A plateful of tiny collectable cakey favourites! High tea, afternoon tea, birthday tea, anytime tea or coffee. Pink, yellow and chocolate french fancies, slices of battenburg, cherry bakewells, three crunchy biccies with jam filling. Choose from the dropdown list - 1 french fancy, 1 slice of battenburg, 1 cherry bakewell or 1 french fancy, 1 slice of battenburg, 3 biscuits or custom plate please contact me stating which 3 items you would prefer on your wee plate (items are made to order - £8) * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * Both cakes and plate are modelled in polymer clay. Cakes are between 1/4 and 1/2 an inch wide. (7mm x 15mm approx.) Biscuits are about 1/4 of an inch diameter (7mm approx) The plate is just under 1 inch in diameter (24mm approx.) * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * My "replicakes" models are not made to any strict scale. They are intended as collectables, not toys.

options.name: cherry bakewell / french fancy / slice of battenburg
biscuits / french fancy / slice of battenburg

name: custom celebration cakes 1
